note:
I'm an elder millenial trans girl cutie just trying to work my though every day as myself with all the authenticity I can muster....

What do I do? Well, mostly work in a tech sector job in Corpo America. I play video games. My favorites include too many to name but here are some: Final Fantasy Series, Legend of Zelda Series, Sim City, basically most RPGs or Simulations. I watch anime. Some of my favorites there are Angel Beats!, Orange, Azumanga Daioh, Nichijou, Evangelion, Gundam 00, basically anything that can rip my heart out or give me fits of laughter

Important things I believe in:

Time is an illusion; lunchtime doubly so.

Impatience for victory always leads to defeat.

Always be your authentic self; it‚Äôs the only person you can be successfully

Freedom of speech does not imply freedom from consequences of that speech.

If you make a system that doesn't support the humans in it, the system doesn't deserve to be supported by the humans.

Accessibility isn't a feature, it's a requirement.
